name: Delicious Beef Tongue Tacos
author: Mama Rivas aka Pablo's Hottie
summary: This is a really mouth-watering way of making tongue. It practically melts in your mouth. Enjoy!
directions: Place the beef tongue in a slow cooker and cover with water
Add the onion slices, garlic, and bay leaf
Cover and cook on Low overnight or 8 hours
Remove the tongue and shred the meat into strands
Heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat
Cook the tomatoes and peppers in the hot oil until softened on all sides
Remove the tomatoes and peppers in a blender, keeping the oil on the heat; season with salt
Blend briefly until still slightly chunky
Cook the diced onion in the skillet until translucent; stir in the tomato mixture
Build the tacos by placing shredded tongue meat into a tortilla and spooning salsa over the meat
